summary: A woman sees an assassin outside San Francisco killing yakuza men and later in Vancouver. She's been told that he leaves no witness. Will she be his next victim or...?
cast: Julie Condra|Kevan Ohtsji|Mark Dacascos|Debbie Podowski|Murray Lowry|Byron Mann|Mikal Tang|Rae Dawn Chong|Jerry Wasserman|Tchéky Karyo|Mako|Tong Lung|Kiyoto Matsumoto|Paul McGillion|Russell Ferrier|Rav Toor|Janie Woods-Morris|Yôko Shimada|Masaya Katô|Giorgio Miyashita|Michael Hirano|Minh Ly|Ed Hong-Louie|Ivy Ng|Paul Wong|Floyd Faircrest|Victor Favrin|Morgan Lam|Brian Rogne|Alex Diakun|Aundrea MacDonald|Akio Higashio|Yukio Kasukawa|Zuien Konomura|Mark Oki|Annie Lee|Yuka Kobayashi|Hiro Kanagawa|Endo Hidemine|Kenji Shimizu
title: Crying Freeman: los paraísos perdidos
